document.full_text: nbc universal beat rivals fox and espn to secure u.s. broadcasting rights to four olympic games from 2014 until 2020 in a deal worth $4.38 billion on tuesday.
document.title: nbc wins tv rights for games until 2020
lines_and_colors: nbc universal beat rivals fox and espn to secure u.s. broadcasting rights to four olympic games from 2014 until 2020 in a deal worth $4.38 billion on tuesday.
